item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "To each his own magic." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "I'm just saying it's not all sand castles and ninjas." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I guess it’s true what they say," observed Jace. "There are no straight men in the trenches." "That’s atheists, jackass," said Simon furiously. "There are no atheists in the trenches." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "There's no need to clarify my finger snap," said Magnus. "The implication was clear in the snap itself." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "So it's you and a syringe against the Capitol? See, this is why no one lets you make the plans." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Yes, frosting. The final defense of the dying." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Carrie Ryan
item.description: "Suddenly, all I can think about are all the things I don't know about him. All the things I never had time to learn. I don't know if his feet are ticklish or how long his toes are. I don't know what nightmares he had as a child. I don't know which stars are his favorites, what shapes he sees in the clouds. I don't know what he is truly afraid of or what memories he holds closest. And I don't have enough time now, never enough time. I want to be in the moment with him, feel his body against mine and think of nothing else, but my mind explodes with grief for all that I am missing. All that I will miss. All that I have wasted." -- Carrie Ryan

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Carrie Ryan
item.description: "They're endless, stretching beyond the horizon and spreading around me like forever. They heave and moan, frothing over each other, cresting and falling. The pure depth and vastness of it all beyond comprehension, my eyes unable to focus on any individual. Instead I'm drowned in their need. They ripple and swell, the bodies of the Mudo, like the ocean. Like the dead-tossed waves." -- Carrie Ryan

item.title: Dingogrrl add a quote by Bryan Lee O'Malley
item.description: "Scott, if your life had a face, I would punch it. I would punch your life in the face." -- Bryan Lee O'Malley
